original_text: I wrote my name on a piece of paper to show that I had bought the land. Some men watched as I did this, to agree to the sale. I closed the paper with a seal. Then I gave Hanamel the silver that I had weighed.
korean_text: 증서를 써서 봉인하고 증인을 세우고 은을 저울에 달아 주고

sentences.original_text: I wrote my name on a piece of paper
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 이름을 종이 조각에 썼습니다

sentences.original_text: to show that I had bought the land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 땅을 샀다는 것을 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: Some men watched as I did this
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들이 내가 이것을 하는 것을 지켜보았습니다

sentences.original_text: I closed the paper with a seal
Then I gave Hanamel the silver
